scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build --workspace=langium-vscode
scripts.dev-build: npm run dev-clean && npm install && npm link ./packages/langium && npm link ./packages/langium-cli && npm link ./packages/generator-langium
scripts.dev-clean: shx rm -rf packages/**/node_modules && npm uninstall -g langium-workspaces langium-cli generator-langium langium && npm unlink langium-workspaces langium-cli generator-langium langium
